title: Warrior / Active (~35)
comment_one:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick".
*1 = Excess points can go into Double Strike up to 41 PTS.
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.
